com.iver.andami.iconthemes
Class IconThemeManager

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.andami.iconthemes.IconThemeManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable, java.util.Collection
public class IconThemeManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Collection

This class controls the icon theme. Contains two themes, the first is a default theme and the second is the current theme. When it creates the class the default and the current theme are the same. Allows change the current theme, register a new theme, delete one,... and all the methods that the Collection interface contains. The themes are stored in an ArrayList.

Author:
eustaquio

Constructor Detail

IconThemeManager

public IconThemeManager()
Default constructor. Creates a iconThemeMemory by default and assigns it like default and current. The default theme is add to the themes ArrayList.
